name: IceHopper2000
description:
2 player local multiplayer. Jump over blocks floating in the ocean to get to the other side. Requires 2 gamepads. The water is lava (you reset).

Throw the other player off by shooting at them! But the aiming is not perfectly accurate..

Inspired by Gang Beasts (the ice level). And3d platformer jumping puzzles.

All assets from Unity except the totally original player, from Kenney assets (Blocky Character)

Made for TasJam [un]disciplined (Hobart, Tasmania) at Enterprize!
